messages.subject: Fwd: re: FYI
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/2/99 5:57:14 PM, megates@juno.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/2/99 5:57:14 PM, megates@... writes:

<< get annoyed at all the cutesy ones that say send this to everyone
you consider a friend, including the person who sent it to you. >>

i agree maryellen, and wonder what is really the point of that anyway? like
who started that and WHY? why not just leave the inspiration to stand on its
own? o well! erin

From: Mary E Gates <megates@...>

>>> but this is a hoax, as is just about anything you get that tells you
to send it to everyone you
know. >>>>

I also get annoyed at all the cutesy ones that say send this to everyone
you consider a friend, including the person who sent it to you. Though
some of the messages are nice and worth reading, I wouldn't want
everything i send out to get sent back to me. it's hard enough to keep
up already.
mary ellen
in WA, typing with one hand again
